english.segment1: He who dwelleth in the secret place. Of the most high shall abide. Under the shadow. Under the shadow. Of the Almighty
english.segment2: Though a thousand. Fall before me. From the evil. That's around me
english.segment3: They shall not. They shall not come nigh my dwelling
english.segment4: And I will say of the Lord He is my refuge and my fortress. My God in Him will I trust. And I will not be afraid of the snare of the fowler. My God in Him will I trust
